name: h5games_poki2
description: A lightweight, Poki-style HTML5 game portal. No frameworks, no build step â€” pure HTML / CSS / JS.

scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && cat css/style.css css/pages.css > dist/css/styles.concat.css && postcss dist/css/styles.concat.css -o dist/css/styles.css && rm dist/css/styles.concat.css
scripts.build:copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && rsync -a --exclude=node_modules --exclude=.git --exclude=scripts --exclude=tools --exclude=env --exclude=.venv --exclude=.history --exclude=.wrangler --exclude=dist --exclude=public ./ dist/ && rsync -a public/ dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:ads: mkdir -p dist && cp -f ads.txt dist/ || true && cp -f app-ads.txt dist/ || true
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:copy && npm run build:images && npm run hash:assets && npm run copy:ads
scripts.build:with-inject: npm run build && npm run inject-ldjson
